attributes.action: Bring back the death sentence for all acts of terrorism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As terrorists in the uk are trying to kill innocent people and if they fail they know they will more or less get away with a lenient sentence, If the death penalty were to be a mandatory sentence to all acts of terrorism as I believe treason still is, then it must be a deterrent and in the interests, of the people of this great country which is being undermined by so called do gooders.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
